ISSUE.TITLE: Migration error from 0.84.16 to 0.90.7 for sqlite3 database
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: NocoDB used as docker : true NocoDB version : 0.90.7 Database used in NC_DB URL : sqlite3 Project was created by clicking : New Project Database on which spreadsheet is created : sqlite3 OS on which NocoDB is running : Ubuntu 18.04.5 TLS Node.js version if running as node : NA Database version : NA **Steps To Reproduce** 1. docker pull nocodb/nocodb 2. sudo docker-compose stop 3. sudo docker-compose up -d 4. See error: "Cannot GET /" Docker container log file: [2J[0fApp started successfully. Visit -> http://localhost:8080/dashboard Creating REST APIs mysql2 - > <_blabla database name_> Creating REST APIs sqlite3 - > /usr/app/data/noco.db Creating REST APIs sqlite3 - > /usr/app/data/noco.db Creating REST APIs sqlite3 - > /usr/app/data/noco.db Creating REST APIs sqlite3 - > /usr/app/data/noco.db Creating REST APIs sqlite3 - > /usr/app/data/noco.db ┌ Migration from 0080000 to 0090000 failed ────────────────────────────────────┐│ ││ Error ││ ----- ││ TypeError: Cannot read property 'id' of undefined ││ at /usr/src/app/docker/main.js:2:1060056 ││ at async Object.t.default [as handler] ││ (/usr/src/app/docker/main.js:2:1059862) ││ at async Function.upgrade (/usr/src/app/docker/main.js:2:1045212) ││ at async B.init (/usr/src/app/docker/main.js:2:3749) ││ at async /usr/src/app/docker/main.js:2:455689 ││ ││ ││ Please raise an issue in our github by using following link : ││ https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/issues/new?labels=Type%3A%20Bug&templat ││ e=bug_report.md ││ ││ Or contact us in our Discord community by following link : ││ https://discord.gg/5RgZmkW ( message @o1lab, @pranavxc or @wingkwong ) ││ │└──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ TypeError: Cannot read property 'id' of undefined at /usr/src/app/docker/main.js:2:1060056 at async Object.t.default [as handler] (/usr/src/app/docker/main.js:2:1059862) at async Function.upgrade (/usr/src/app/docker/main.js:2:1045212) at async B.init (/usr/src/app/docker/main.js:2:3749) at async /usr/src/app/docker/main.js:2:455689 Expected behaviour: able to log in after the update. Thanks a lot for your help!
